channel.title: Krackkid strikes again
channel.description:
Well as you know I have had a change of attitude, I was punished for my double accounts and it was removed.
But now? I still remain hated by krackkid, and no he didn't send this to me, he sent it to my friend who never mentioned me AT ALL..
I never said I hated him, and this so called 'fight' on msn happened around 6 months ago. I do not know why he always fricken continues but this shows that he just hates me still and I never was mentioned at all in this, my friend sent me this image to show what a lunatic he really is. Infact, I thought he was acting kindly to me in the models section until I saw this image.
[img]http://www.artyarts.com/Trollololol.png[/img]
